001
002package io.vrap.rmf.base.client.oauth2;
003
004import java.time.Duration;
005import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
006
007import dev.failsafe.Failsafe;
008import dev.failsafe.FailsafeExecutor;
009import dev.failsafe.Timeout;
010
011import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.AuthenticationToken;
012import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.AutoCloseableService;
013
014public class InMemoryTokenSupplier extends AutoCloseableService implements RefreshableTokenSupplier {
015    private final TokenSupplier supplier;
016    private final Object lock = new Object();
017    private volatile CompletableFuture<AuthenticationToken> tokenFuture;
018
019    private final FailsafeExecutor<AuthenticationToken> failsafeExecutor;
020
021    public InMemoryTokenSupplier(TokenSupplier tokenSupplier) {
022        this.supplier = tokenSupplier;
023        this.failsafeExecutor = Failsafe.with(Timeout.of(Duration.ofSeconds(10)));
024    }
025
026    public CompletableFuture<AuthenticationToken> getToken() {
027        if (tokenFuture == null)
028            synchronized (lock) {
029                if (tokenFuture == null) {
030                    failsafeExecutor
031                            .run(() -> tokenFuture = CompletableFuture.completedFuture(supplier.getToken().join()));
032                }
033            }
034        return tokenFuture;
035    }
036
037    public CompletableFuture<AuthenticationToken> refreshToken() {
038        synchronized (lock) {
039            tokenFuture = null;
040        }
041        return getToken();
042    }
043
044    @Override
045    protected void internalClose() {
046        if (supplier instanceof AutoCloseable)
047            closeQuietly((AutoCloseable) supplier);
048    }
049}
